page.title: 20SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Disappointing though it was, apparent- ly the area contains very few{ghosts, and the ones which do exist seem to be friendly.There is only one ghost story we have been told,and the ghost was seen at{Brogyntyn Hall.}A man was walking through a nearby tunnel and he just happened to look behind him, where he saw a{grey lady}beckoning to him.He then carried on walking and later looked back to see the woman still following. He later heard that it was probably the ghost of a woman who drowned several years before nearby. Brogyntyn is just the place for a ghost! Our work is now complete! Victoria, Ruth, Bella, Amber, Caroline, Hannah, Kate and Helen are back{Moreton Hall. {It may}have been a wet Summer but those days up in the border hills will be unforgettable!
